headline: Viatris Appoints Lara Ramsburg as Chief People and Corporate Affairs Officer
summary: Viatris Inc. (Nasdaq: VTRS) announced today that Lara Ramsburg has been appointed Chief People and Corporate Affairs Officer. As part of Viatris' ongoing transformation efforts, this newly combined role is designed to continue to advance the company's culture and connectivity across the globe, while also strengthening the alignment of the organization's internal and external stakeholder communication strategies.

headline: 1 Stock Under $50 Worth Your Attention and 2 That Underwhelm
summary: Stocks trading between $10 and $50 can be particularly interesting as they frequently represent businesses that have survived their early challenges. However, investors should remain vigilant as some may still have unproven business models, leaving them vulnerable to the ebbs and flows of the broader market.
